text: gei Dimaadua ga helekai gi Hosea, “Gahia di ingoo o maa bolo ‘Jezreel’1.4 Jezreel: Hoohoo adu gi di waahale deenei, gei Jehu gu daaligi gii made di king o Israel mo nia gau o di king huogodoo, ga daamada gaa hai di madawaawa king o Israel hoou , idimaa, hagalee duai gei Au ga hagahuaidu di king o Israel mai i di huaidu o tamana madua o maa go Jehu dela ne hai dana daaligi dangada i Jezreel. Au ga haga lawa di madawaawa Jehu gi dee king i hongo Israel.1.4 2 Kings 10.11
